tokens.text: controls fog rendering settings for a biome

title: Minecraft Fog Appearance
description: Sets the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Fog Appearance

fields.title: Fog Identifier
